mil7.2.9:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vāyasassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.2.9:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āsaṅkitaparisaṅkitena yattapayattena upaṭṭhitāya satiyā saṃvutehi indriyehi caritabbaṃ.
mil7.2.9:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyasassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.9:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyaso yaṃ kiñci bhojanaṃ disvā ñātīhi saṃvibhajitvā bhuñjati;
mil7.2.9:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi, tathārūpehi lābhehi paṭivibhattabhoginā bhavitabbaṃ sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi.
mil7.2.9:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyasassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
